flawed_nl_solution:
The profit Ronald wants is $3000 / 3 = $<<3000/3=10000>>10000
The profit per phone sold will be $10000 / 200 phones = $<<10000/200=50>>50/phone
The cost of each phone is $3000 / 200 phones = $<<3000/200=15>>15/phone
The selling price including the profit will be $15/phone + $50/phone = $<<15+50=65>>65
#### 65

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 1000, not 10000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
